dmca.title: [ThePlanetAbuse-C3242035N] Copyright violation
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern: Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not substantially comply with the required notification elements of the Digital Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA"). Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your claim. Please visit our web site at www.theplanet.com/about_us/legal_docs/ThePlanet%20Copyright%20Infringeme nt%2001%2015%2007%20FINAL.pdf Legal Response Team THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC. -----Original Message----- From: abuse@theplanet.com [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] Sent: Wednesday, February 28, 2007 2:53 AM To: Copyright Subject: [ThePlanetAbuse-C3242035N] Copyright violation ==== Forwarded Ticket ==== 1. Copyright violation Added by system at Monday, Feb 26 2007 12:49 pm X-MailFrom: nayci5@yahoo.com X-RcptTo: abacus@abacus.ev1servers.net Received: from [216.12.192.67] by [216.12.192.78] (abacus) for ; Mon Feb 26 12:49:25 2007 Received: (qmail 2894 invoked by alias); 26 Feb 2007 18:49:25 -0000 Delivered-To: abuse@inbound.abacus.ev1servers.net Received: (qmail 2891 invoked from network); 26 Feb 2007 18:49:24 -0000 Received: from smtp02.theplanet.com (70.87.6.111) by inbound.abacus.ev1servers.net with SMTP; 26 Feb 2007 18:49:24 -0000 Received: from mail.theplanet.com ([216.185.111.52]) by smtp02.theplanet.com with Microsoft SMTPSVC(6.0.3790.1830); Mon, 26 Feb 2007 12:49:23 -0600 Return-path: Delivery-date: Mon, 26 Feb 2007 12:49:23 -0600 Received: from mx01.inside.filter.theplanet.com ([172.16.214.180] helo=mx01.filter.theplanet.com) by mail.theplanet.com (envelope-from nayci5@yahoo.com) with esmtps (TLSv1:DHE-RSA-AES256-SHA:256) (Exim) id 1HLkuZ-0007Cc-Hp for abuse@theplanet.com; Mon, 26 Feb 2007 12:49:23 -0600 Received: from web37315.mail.mud.yahoo.com ([209.191.91.132]) by mx01.filter.theplanet.com (envelope-from nayci5@yahoo.com) with smtp (Exim) id 1HLkuL-000LTL-8k for abuse@theplanet.com; Mon, 26 Feb 2007 12:49:09 -0600 Received: (qmail 40686 invoked by uid 60001); 26 Feb 2007 18:49:07 -0000 DomainKey-Signature: a=rsa-sha1; q=dns; c=nofws; s=s1024; d=yahoo.com; h=X-YMail-OSG:Received:Date:From:Subject:To:MIME-Version:Content-Type:Co ntent-Transfer-Encoding:Message-ID; b=YxQ+5Hn6vipOetD32IpBcsFm+93EaM8OROeweZN4VC/rQwz7S7KpbfqWgSZRTOH8b0t575 XSxpwZozPG/tXdsORnFMwuFSSkzUvheD/vx+x0G0OCyQgRur5lIwQ5SACKMOizPj1wWapMxc 5OZbSw98qvyAVuNjrqCdwkOZL8CAo=; X-YMail-OSG: tUQKAtUVM1kSBBftxyJ4DD.Kmp2aGWZ8Snco7ls58uBJ5ciosqnspAK8gqkV1XtwT1PdSXcG l2Z7ZNRmXzYyyJ35AZefYvCVQxRa8djdHRwuIYR4LTujellVwg7xExFhaM.pYfmzeA_sD4Q- Received: from [68.161.154.138] by web37315.mail.mud.yahoo.com via HTTP; Mon, 26 Feb 2007 10:49:07 PST Date: Mon, 26 Feb 2007 10:49:07 -0800 (PST) From: Matt Nayci Subject: Copyright violation To: abuse@theplanet.com MIME-Version: 1.0 Content-Type: multipart/alternative; boundary="0-1098382849-1172515747=:40039" Content-Transfer-Encoding: 8bit Message-ID: <665796.40039.qm@web37315.mail.mud.yahoo.com> X-OriginalArrivalTime: 26 Feb 2007 18:49:23.0718 (UTC) FILETIME=[D524CA60:01C759D6] (multipart/alternative) MIME element (text/plain) Hi, Please be advised that I am the owner of website www.naycicontracting.com & www.naycicorp.com . A website you hosting named www.caparcontracting.com & www.caparcontracting.net is violating my copyright laws. All content and pictures are exactly the same as my website. I have start all required and necessary procedures for your client, website developer, and the planet group. Matt Nayci nayci5@yahoo.com --------------------------------- Finding fabulous fares is fun. Let Yahoo! FareChase search your favorite travel sites to find flight and hotel bargains. MIME element (text/html)
Hi,
 
Please be advised that I am the owner of website www.naycicontracting.com  ; & www.naycicorp.com . A website you hosting named www.caparcontracting.com & www.caparcontracting.net is violating my copyright laws. All content and pictures are exactly the same as my website.
 
I have start all required and necessary procedures for your client, website developer, and the planet group.
 
Matt Nayci
nayci5@yahoo.com
